description: Try our easy to follow Smoked Salmon & Potato Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Cold canap√©s,Pescatarian,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Potato,High protein,Soy free,Wheat free,Peanut free,Salmon
name: Smoked Salmon & Potato Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Put Spud Lite Potatoes into a pot and cover with cool water. Place on a stove and bring to a boil. Boil for approximately 15 to 20 minutes until soft in the middle. Drain cooked potatoes and once cool, slice into wedges.
In a large bowl, add the sour cream, diced red onion, chopped dill and chopped capers and mix these together.
Now add the sliced Spud Lite Potatoes into the large bowl stir until combined.
Lay out the slices of smoked salmon and place the dressed potato slices onto the salmon and wrap. Place skewer through to hold salmon in place over the potato.
